name: homebridge-harman-kardon-avr
description: control harman kardon avr for homebridge: https://github.com/nfarina/homebridge
author: Marcel Kordek

scripts.publish:patch: npm version patch && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:minor: npm version minor && git push && npm publish
scripts.publish:major: npm version major && git push && npm publish
scripts.version: auto-changelog -p -u --template keepachangelog --commit-limit false && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
scripts.prepush: auto-changelog -p -u --template keepachangelog --commit-limit false && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md'
